ques: Our schedules ________ perfectly, so we can meet for lunch.
It's important to ________ your anger in certain situations.
I can ________ you that the product is of high quality.
Teamwork is an ________ part of our success.
The constant rain can ________ the soil over time.
I'll have a small ________ of dessert, please.
As a manager, you should support your ________s.
The goal is to ________ all the departments under one management.
I enjoy having deep ________ with my close friends.
He served in the ________ for several years.
The launch date will ________ with the holiday season.
The treaty aims to ________ the two countries' policies.
Please ________ the customer that their issue will be resolved.
Let's ________ about our plans for the weekend.
The river's current has started to ________ the riverbank.
Education is considered an ________ part of personal development.
The recipe makes four ________s, so we can share.
The ________ is responsible for national defense.
He felt frustrated working as a ________ to his boss.
The police had to ________ the unruly crowd.
The waves will slowly ________ the coastline.
He struggled to ________ his emotions during the speech.
It's rare for our interests to ________ like this.
The project leader reported to a higher-ranking ________.
Effective communication is ________ in any relationship.
Her kind words ________ me that everything will be okay.
She divided the cake into equal ________s.
Efforts to ________ the team's efforts have been successful.
It's important to ________ openly with your partner.
The country has a strong ________ presence.
He needed to ________ his team of their importance.
The restaurant offers generous ________s of food.
Overuse of the resource can ________ its availability.
Music has the power to ________ people from different backgrounds.
She had several ________s who reported to her.
Healthy eating is ________ to maintaining good health.
________ strategies are often complex and strategic.
Their opinions on the matter ________ surprisingly.
We can ________ about various topics over dinner.
She used all her strength to ________ the struggling dog.
The leader's vision was to ________ the community.
Can you save a ________ of the meal for later?
The team members respected their ________ and followed their lead.
The legal department is an ________ component of the company.
The manager wanted to ________ the employees of job security.
The ________ conducts training exercises regularly.
Efforts to protect the environment aim to prevent ________ of natural resources.
The two events will ________ on the same day.
I had a casual ________ with my neighbor.
Please ________ from making any hasty decisions.
